text: Now in those days a decree went out from Caesar Augustus to register all the empire for taxes.

<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> the <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="582" class="">registration</st>, taken when <st data-num="2958" class="">Quirinius</st> <st data-num="2230">was governor</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="4947" class="">Syria</st>.

<st data-num="1538" class="">Everyone</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4198" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1438">his own</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st><n id="2" /> to be <st data-num="583" class="">registered</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="305">went up</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st> of <st data-num="3478" class="">Nazareth</st><n id="2" /> in <st data-num="1056" class="">Galilee</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st>, <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> <st data-num="965" class="">Bethlehem</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3965">family line</st><n id="6" /> of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>.

He went<n id="1" /> to be <st data-num="583" class="">registered</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st>, who <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3423">promised in marriage</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="2" /> and who <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1471">expecting a child</st>.

<st data-num="1722">While</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st>, the <st data-num="2250" class="">time</st> <st data-num="4130" class="">came</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> to <st data-num="5088">deliver her child</st>.<n id="2" />
And she gave birth to her firstborn son and wrapped him in strips of cloth and laid him in a manger, because there was no place for them in the inn.
Now there were shepherds nearby living out in the field, keeping guard over their flock at night.

An<n id="1" /> <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2186" class="">appeared</st> to<n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="4034">shone around</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="5399" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">absolutely</st> <st data-num="5399" class="">terrified</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st>! <st data-num="2400">Listen carefully</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> I <st data-num="2097" class="">proclaim</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2097">good news</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3748" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">brings</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people:</st>

<st data-num="4594" class="">Today</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4990" class="">Savior</st> is <st data-num="5088" class="">born</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>.<n id="3" /> He <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.

<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st><n id="1" /> will be a <st data-num="4592" class="">sign</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you:</st> You will <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> a <st data-num="1025" class="">baby</st> <st data-num="4683">wrapped in strips of cloth</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2749" class="">lying</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="5336" class="">manger</st>.”<n id="3" />
Suddenly a vast, heavenly army appeared with the angel, praising God and saying,

“Glory to God in the highest,

and on earth peace among people with whom he is pleased!”
When the angels left them and went back to heaven, the shepherds said to one another, “Let us go over to Bethlehem and see this thing that has taken place, that the Lord has made known to us.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="2064 4692">hurried off</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="429" class="">located</st> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> found the <st data-num="1025" class="">baby</st> <st data-num="2749" class="">lying</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="5336" class="">manger</st>.<n id="1" />

When<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> him,<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="1107" class="">related</st> <st data-num="4487">what</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> had been <st data-num="2980" class="">told</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3813" class="">child</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> it were <st data-num="2296" class="">astonished</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">at</st> what the <st data-num="4166" class="">shepherds</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">said</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st> <st data-num="4933" class="">treasured up</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="4487" class="">words</st>, <st data-num="4820" class="">pondering</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st> what they might mean.<n id="1" />
So the shepherds returned, glorifying and praising God for all they had heard and seen; everything was just as they had been told.
At the end of eight days, when he was circumcised, he was named Jesus, the name given by the angel before he was conceived in the womb.
Now when the time came for their purification according to the law of Moses, Joseph and Mary brought Jesus up to Jerusalem to present him to the Lord
(just as it is written in the law of the Lord, “Every firstborn male will be set apart to the Lord”),
and to offer a sacrifice according to what is specified in the law of the Lord, a pair of doves or two young pigeons.
Now there was a man in Jerusalem named Simeon who was righteous and devout, looking for the restoration of Israel, and the Holy Spirit was upon him.

It<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510">had been</st> <st data-num="5537" class="">revealed</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> that he would <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492 2288">die</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4250" class="">before</st><n id="4" /> he had <st data-num="1492" class="">seen</st> the <st data-num="2962">Lord’s</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> Simeon,<n id="2" /> directed <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="1118" class="">parents</st> <st data-num="1521" class="">brought in</st> the <st data-num="3813" class="">child</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">for</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> what was <st data-num="1480" class="">customary</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">according to</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>,<n id="5" />
Simeon took him in his arms and blessed God, saying,
“Now, according to your word, Sovereign Lord, permit your servant to depart in peace.
For my eyes have seen your salvation
that you have prepared in the presence of all peoples:

a light,

for revelation to the Gentiles

and for glory to your people Israel.”
So the child’s father and mother were amazed at what was said about him.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4826" class="">Simeon</st> <st data-num="2127" class="">blessed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st>, “<st data-num="2400" class="">Listen carefully</st>:<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">This child</st><n id="3" /> is <st data-num="2749" class="">destined</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to be the cause of</st> the <st data-num="4431" class="">falling</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="386" class="">rising</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1519">to be</st> a <st data-num="4592" class="">sign</st> that will be <st data-num="483" class="">rejected</st>.<n id="5" />
Indeed, as a result of him the thoughts of many hearts will be revealed—and a sword will pierce your own soul as well!”
There was also a prophetess, Anna the daughter of Phanuel, of the tribe of Asher. She was very old, having been married to her husband for seven years until his death.

<st data-num="846">She</st> had lived as a <st data-num="5503" class="">widow</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">since</st> then for <st data-num="3589" class="">eighty</st>-<st data-num="5064">four</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st>.<n id="1" /> She <st data-num="3756" class="">never</st> <st data-num="868" class="">left</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple</st>, <st data-num="3000" class="">worshiping</st> with <st data-num="3521" class="">fasting</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1162" class="">prayer</st> <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>.<n id="2" />
At that moment, she came up to them and began to give thanks to God and to speak about the child to all who were waiting for the redemption of Jerusalem.
So when Joseph and Mary had performed everything according to the law of the Lord, they returned to Galilee, to their own town of Nazareth.
And the child grew and became strong, filled with wisdom, and the favor of God was upon him.
Now Jesus’ parents went to Jerusalem every year for the Feast of the Passover.

<st data-num="3753" class="">When</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1427" class="">twelve</st> <st data-num="2094">years</st> old,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="846">they</st> <st data-num="305">went up</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> <st data-num="1485" class="">custom</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2250" class="">when</st> the feast was <st data-num="5048" class="">over</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">as</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> were <st data-num="5290">returning</st> home,<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="3816" class="">boy</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5278">stayed behind</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2419">Jerusalem</st>. <st data-num="846" class="">His</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1118" class="">parents</st><n id="5" /> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> it,

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> (because they <st data-num="3543" class="">assumed</st> that <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> their <st data-num="4923">group of travelers</st>)<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="2064" class="">went</st> a <st data-num="2250">day’s</st> <st data-num="3598" class="">journey</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="2" /> they began to <st data-num="327">look for</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> their <st data-num="4773" class="">relatives</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1110" class="">acquaintances</st>.<n id="3" />

When<n id="1" /> they did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> him, they <st data-num="5290" class="">returned</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2419">Jerusalem</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="327">look for</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="3326" class="">After</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st><n id="2" /> they <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411" class="">temple courts</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2516" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="1320" class="">teachers</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="191" class="">listening</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1905" class="">asking</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1905">questions</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> were <st data-num="1839" class="">astonished</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> his <st data-num="4907" class="">understanding</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="612" class="">answers</st>.

When<n id="1" /> his parents<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, they were <st data-num="1605" class="">overwhelmed</st>. <st data-num="846" class="">His</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="5043">Child</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> have you <st data-num="4160" class="">treated</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="3779">like this</st>? <st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="2504">and I</st> have been <st data-num="2212">looking for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3600" class="">anxiously</st>.”<n id="6" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004">replied</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> were you <st data-num="2212">looking for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>?<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3756">Didn’t</st> you <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father’s</st> house?”<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Yet</st><n id="1" /> his <st data-num="846" class="">parents</st><n id="2" /> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4920" class="">understand</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="4487" class="">remark</st><n id="4" /> he <st data-num="2980" class="">made</st><n id="5" /> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.
Then he went down with them and came to Nazareth, and was obedient to them. But his mother kept all these things in her heart.
And Jesus increased in wisdom and in stature and in favor with God and with people.
